issue.title: Ad Blocking Rules for dashichang.work
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

The singing synthesis website “dashichang (All Sing)” collects users’ access dates, IP addresses, and geographic locations through a PHP file. However, the site does not clearly disclose the purpose or handling of this data. To protect user privacy, it is recommended to add the following rules to block the collection of this information while allowing the website to function properly.

### Proposed solution

||dashichang.work/Statistics/statistics.*$all,important
||yqzhishen.me/Statistics/statistics.*$all,important

### Additional information

_No response_
